name: Pink Onion
author: Kai A.
description:
I was a bit disappointed with the dishes. We ordered:

Meatballs appetizer- bland, needed salt. The consistency was cooked just right but something was lacking.

Truffle bruschetta- bland, also needed salt. I really wanted to like it because of the truffle but lacked seasoning. 

U'sfincione- my favorite dish of the dinner. It's their one of their two Sicilian pizzas. It was savory, soft, and not dry. I loved that it had  pine nuts and caramelized onions providing the sweetness and crunch to the dish.
